name: Spring Fever (VGDC@NCSU)
description:
Description

Life is hard for a nose in Spring, so it's time to toughen up! Avoid allergens like dandelions and silkworms to keep yourself from sneezing. The longer you last, the more points you'll earn. Use those points to buy upgrades and become the strongest nose around!

This game was made in Unity for the 2018 VGDC Spring Game Jam.

Game Instructions
  • Movement - A & D or Left and Right arrow keys
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Abilities
    • Rain - Q
    • Slow Time - E
    • Invincibility - R
  • Exit game - Esc
Credits
  • Meghan Tankersley - Art (background)
  • Tanya Mittal - Art (nose)
  • Joshitha Muthukrishnan - Art (tree)
  • Alberto Carrillo - Art (other sprites)
  • Jackson Bostian - Audio
  • Dominic Bagnoli - Programming
